<title level="1" right="Trait">[Companion](/Traits.aspx?ID=558)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 272 <sup>2.0</sup>

An item with this trait can be worn by an [animal companion](AnimalCompanions.aspx) or similar creature. A companion can have up to two items invested.
